name: outlook-calendar-api
description: API for Outlook Calendar App with MongoDB

scripts.build-info: powershell -Command "$commit = git rev-parse --short HEAD; $time = Get-Date -Format o; @{commit=$commit; buildTime=$time} | ConvertTo-Json | Out-File -Encoding utf8 build-info.json"
scripts.deploy: npm run build-info && az webapp up --resource-group DefaultResourceGroup-EUS --name emanuelnyc-services-api --runtime NODE:20-lts
